body: honestly, idk, i guess that amid all the horrible news that just keeps coming all the time there's still [sometimes some good](https://www.cnn.com/videos/politics/2018/06/27/alexandria-ocasio-cortez-new-york-reaction-vpx.ny1). i'm thankful to cherish that good.
normalized_markdown: honestly, idk, i guess that amid all the horrible news that just keeps coming all the time there's still [sometimes some good](https://www.cnn.com/videos/politics/2018/06/27/alexandria-ocasio-cortez-new-york-reaction-vpx.ny1). i'm thankful to cherish that good.
